name: Deceitful
text: You are skilled at deceiving others, both with the spoken word and with physical disguises.
benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Bluff and Disguise skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
mythicText: Your power to mislead is beyond compare.
mythicBenefit: The bonus on Bluff and Disguise skill checks from Deceitful increases by 2. In addition, you can expend one use of mythic power to treat a Bluff or Disguise check as if you had rolled a natural 20. You must decide to use this ability before making the roll.
text_zh: 你善于欺骗他人，无论谎言还是乔装易容。
benefit_zh: 你在所有唬骗和易容技能检定上获得+2加值。如果某技能受训等级10以上，则对应加值改为+4。
mythicText_zh: 说起误导他人的技术，无人能与你匹敌。
mythicBenefit_zh: 诈欺师专长对唬骗与易容技能检定带来的加值增加2点。此外，你能够花费1次神话之力，使得1次唬骗或者易容检定就好像自然掷出20一般。你必须在进行检定之前决定使用该能力。
